messages.message: Hi, I wanted to understand how the vector index in the backend works. I'm split-classifying documents into multiple records, and then running them through AIHub (via refiner). The responses for each record are identical (even when the answer is derived from a chunk which is not part of the page range of a given record), which would suggest that the vector db is indexed on the originating file name rather than records. is this true and whats the best way around this?
@Bastiane @hannah Vishnu above is leading the charge on figuring out submission ingestion via refiner. Worth connecting here after we figure this out to see costs :eyes:
